Package com.todoroo.astrid.sync

Astrid synchronization helpers

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SyncBackgroundService Performs synchronization service logic in background service to avoid ANR (application not responding) messages.
SyncContainer Container class for transmitting tasks and including local and remote metadata.
SyncMetadataService<TYPE extends SyncContainer>  
SyncProvider<TYPE extends SyncContainer> A helper class for writing synchronization services for Astrid.
SyncProviderPreferences Utility class for common synchronization action: displaying synchronization preferences and an action panel so users can initiate actions from the menu.
SyncProviderUtilities Sync Provider Utility class for accessing preferences
 

Package com.todoroo.astrid.sync Description

Astrid synchronization helpers
